title: Cross-modal Knowledge Diffusion-based Generation for Difference-aware Medical VQA

abstract: Multimodal medical applications have garnered considerable attention due to their potential to offer comprehensive and robust support for medical assistance. Specifically, within this domain, difference-aware medical Visual Question Answering …
